pageContext.description: 6 Rivet holes - 3 rivets. Metallic bronze colour, stained black in places. Hilt is quite black. Point is broken. The edge of the point half is much jagged. The hilt half has a few dents which appear to be modern.
pageContext.surface: Surface of the point half is much eaten away. The hilt half only slightly so. Has been welded toether in the centre. The 2 pieces do not appear to be fragments of the same sword, out pieces of 3 different swords of identical patterns. The resultant sword is about 47mm longer than the original.
pageContext.collection: Private Collection, J.W. Clarke Esq.,Bridwall, no. Uffenline, Devon,1921
